content: I have noticed ${ballotstatus} shows up in the header of our IG, and I assume it should say draft? I can see that the framework is trying to grab that from somewhere, but have to admit I am not 100% sure where? Anyone know? @Lloyd McKenzie
Fixed. (We were missing something in the properties.txt file)
Ummm, looks like it still shows the same on build.fhir.org ?
I had to do a build first before committing. Re-committed and now working correctly
